Posts.Content: Jun 2, 2017 04:33PM Topaz122 wrote: I am new to this forum. Started Ibrance 1/17 125 mg. and had 10 days of radiation during the 21 day cycle. Ended up in hospital for one week and no Ibrance for about 40 days. Then "negotiated" Ibrance 75 mg. with my onc. Just started 3rd cycle of Ibrance without Letrozole. I've been on Anastrozole since about 7/17.
